testsuite.name: Nurego::ApiResource

testcase.name: Nurego::ApiResource creating a new APIResource should not fetch over the network
Nurego::ApiResource creating a new APIResource from a hash should not fetch over the network
Nurego::ApiResource setting an attribute should not cause a network request
Nurego::ApiResource accessing id should not issue a fetch
Nurego::ApiResource not specifying api credentials should raise an exception
Nurego::ApiResource specifying api credentials containing whitespace should raise an exception
Nurego::ApiResource specifying invalid api credentials should raise an exception
Nurego::ApiResource AuthenticationErrors should have an http status, http body, and JSON body

testsuite.system-err: WARNING: Running without SSL cert verification because /home/ilia/work/ops/nurego-ruby/lib/data/ca-certificates.crt isn't readable
